entry.title: The Wegley Kelly Lab join Scripps Institution of Oceanography!

link.title: The Wegley Kelly Lab join Scripps Institution of Oceanography!

entry.content:
The Wegley Kelly lab is joining SIO!

</br> We are extremely excited to being joining the Scripps marine biology program! Our lab specializes in multi-omic analyses to understand coral reef dynamics and we are extatic to both continue our collaborations at SIO and also form many new ones. </br> </br> We cannot wait to meet our new colleagues! /-From Linda and Zach
entry.summary: The Wegley Kelly lab is joining SIO! </br> We are extremely excited to being joining the Scripps marine biology program! Our lab specializes in multi-omic analyses to understand coral reef dynamics and we are extatic to both continue our collaborations at SIO and also form many new ones. </br> </br> We cannot wait to meet our new colleagues! /-From Linda and Zach
